thread.title: Doom 3 Perfected + Wulfen Texture Pack issue

post.author: bortlicenseplate
post.body:
Hi all, I was wondering if I could get some help with this issue I've been having when using the Perfected Doom 3 Mod and Wulfen's Texture pack.
The game runs fine and looks great, the only problem is that all of the in-game computer monitors are blank / missing their texture, making it impossible to interact with them.
Any help I could get with this would be highly appreciated. Thanks for reading!

Steam version of doom 3
Windows 7 Service Pack 1
nVidia gtx 580
intel i7 920 @3.8 ghz
12 gb memory
onboard sound chipset
Driver version 301.42
Latest Direct X

post.author: bortlicenseplate
post.body: Wasn't expecting a response from the mod maker himself . Of course, your suggestion worked perfectly. Thank you very much!
